title: District Annual Conference
description:
Join Rotarians from across the district for a weekend of inspiration, fellowship, and service. Featuring keynote speakers, breakout sessions on leadership development, and the annual awards gala recognizing outstanding service projects.

Early bird registration available until June 15th.

title: End Polio Now Fundraising Gala
description:
An elegant evening supporting Rotary's signature initiative to eradicate polio worldwide. Enjoy gourmet dining, live entertainment, and a silent auction featuring exclusive experiences and artwork.

All proceeds will be matched 2:1 by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

title: Rotaract Professional Development & Career Fair
description:
Connecting young professionals with career opportunities and mentorship. Features workshops on resume building, interview skills, and networking sessions with established Rotarians from various industries.

Open to all Rotaract members and guests aged 18-30.
